name: calcined clay to generic market for supplementary cementitious materials | supplementary cementitious materials | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25308/documentation

This activity is a renaming activity, linking calcined clay to the generic market for supplementary cementitious materials (SCM).

The activity starts with the input of calcined clay.

The activity ends with the provision of a generic kg of supplementary cementitious materials.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
